sentences.sContent: the dangers of fragmenting the Health Service
sentences.sCn: 医疗保健服务分崩离析的危险

synos.tran: 碎片；片断或不完整部分

remMethod.val: frag(打碎) + ment(名词后缀) → 碎片， 片断

words.tran: 碎片的；不完全的；断断续续的
破片的，碎片的；不完全的，零碎的
破碎；分裂；[计] 存储残片
分裂（fragment的过去分词）；使成碎片

trans.tranOther: to break something, or be broken into a lot of small separate parts – used to show disapproval

trans.tranCn: 碎片， 小部分， 片断
trans.tranOther: a small piece of something that has broken off or that comes from something larger
